participant_1.background:
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
I remember spending hours reading books in the library with my mom when I was a kid.
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.

participant_2.background:
I've been single for a while now because I'm too focused on my career.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
My job is secure and I get paid well.
My parents were very supportive of my interests and hobbies.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.

content.text: Hello! I'm a filmmaker who loves to read and spend time with my family. How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time. I'm doing well today, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but I think my favorite is "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" by Douglas Adams. It's such a funny and imaginative book.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all of the Harry Potter books, and I also really enjoy the "Percy Jackson" series by Rick Riordan.
I've read a few of the Harry Potter books, but I haven't read any of the Percy Jackson books. I'll have to check them out!
No problem! So, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to read, go hiking, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read and go hiking too.
It's so nice to meet someone who has similar interests!
Yes, it is! I'm glad we met!
